segments.text: Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we would like to take a tour to L . A .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's really a big city . How long do your vacations last ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 2 weeks . Can I have a brochure of the sightseeing tours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . Take your time .
segments.speaker: S1
